statements: SELECT * FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM OrderHistory WHERE total_price > 100.00;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM OrderHistory GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM OrderHistory WHERE customer_id = 500 AND quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC, total_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_price) AS total_spent FROM OrderHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, product_id FROM OrderHistory WHERE quantity IN (5, 10, 15) ORDER BY customer_id, product_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM order_history;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM order_history WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM order_history ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(unit_price * quantity) AS total_price FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT * FROM order_items WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY order_id ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_history
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM order_history WHERE customer_id=1 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM order_history JOIN order_items ON order_history.order_id = order_items.order_id WHERE order_items.quantity > 10
SELECT order_id, SUM(unit_price * quantity) AS total_cost FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_cost > 1000
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_order_amount FROM order_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_order_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age >= 30
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductCatalog LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory JOIN CustomerPreferences ON OrderHistory.customer_id = CustomerPreferences.customer_id
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ProductCatalog WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT order_date, customer_id, product_id FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductCatalog WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT o.order_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name FROM Orders o JOIN Customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN OrderItems oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN Products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Products JOIN OrderItems ON Products.product_id = OrderItems.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM order_history WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, product_id, customer_id, rating, review_text FROM product_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM order_history WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM product_reviews WHERE customer_id = 3 AND rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
